channel.title: Noob perm question
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Noob perm question" - Do they stack?

item.title: Re: Noob perm question
item.content:encoded: No item, permanent or otherwise, stacks with itself (with the sole exception of Emergency Rations). Thus 2 Jazz Hands will give you +3 Str.

item.title: Noob perm question
item.content:encoded:
So I'm rather new to BvS and just got both of my bloodline arena items today. I checked the wiki, and it said that it stacks w/ other arena bloodline items. So, my questions:

1. Does the stack mean it works with the other arena items at the same time, so I should go for all 6 (techniques and warrior of â€¦), or does it mean that if I get another Jazz hand, i will have +6 str?

2. If I have 2 of any permanent items, do any stack effects? (i.e. Buy 2 Ninja dogs from shop for +2 nin range)

Sorry if its been asked a lot beforehand, or incredibly stupid.
